That's the right attitude! By doing your research, asking questions, and finding a reputable jeweler, you'll be able to find a beautiful peridot necklace that fits your style and budget. And, you'll have the added bonus of getting your engagement ring resized to fit perfectly.

Remember to take your time, don't rush into a purchase, and make sure you're comfortable with the jeweler and the piece you choose. A good jeweler will be happy to work with you to find the perfect piece and answer all your questions.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Good luck with your search, and I hope you find the perfect peridot necklace!
